munit:test.name: processOrders_returns2ElementMap
munit:test.description: Calling processOrders flow returns two element map

munit:assert-true.doc:name: Assert Payload Type == Map
munit:assert-true.message: Expected payload to be Map, but it was #[payload.getClass().getName()]

munit:test.name: processOrders_internationalKeyReturnsInternationalOrders
munit:test.description: The value of the map key international contains only international orders

munit:assert-true.doc:name: Assert Payload contains international orders
munit:assert-true.message: Expected payload to have at least one international order

munit:assert-on-equals.message: item [#[counter]] location expected international but was #[payload.location]
munit:assert-on-equals.doc:name: Assert location == international

munit:test.name: processOrders_domesticKeyReturnsDomesticOrders
munit:test.description: The value of the map key domestic contains only domestic orders

munit:assert-true.message: Expected payload to have at least one domestic order
munit:assert-true.doc:name: Assert Payload contains domestic orders

munit:assert-on-equals.message: item [#[counter]] location expected domestic but was #[payload.location]
munit:assert-on-equals.doc:name: Assert location == domestic
